input_email_body:
Subject: Security Incident: Potential Breach of Medical Information

There was a security event where there might have been an unauthorized leak of medical data You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. The initial analysis suggests that inadequate access controls could have contributed to the vulnerability My name is Sophia Rossi.. Initial evaluations have been carried out.
